Cleansweep.sub-heading: A volunteer management system for Aam Adami Party.
summary: Started by veteran programmer Anand Chitipothu, Cleansweep tracks and manages the activities of party volunteers across all polling booths, polling stations, wards, assembly constituencies, districts and states.
I've been an active developer of cleansweep since Sep '15. I helped scrape GBs of electoral data, build APIs, SMS Bridge and many more things.

SubFinder.sub-heading: Download subtitles for your movie files.
summary: SubFinder lets you find accurate subtitle along with movie details for your video files. Subtitles which were made just for your file. Best part? Your file name doesn't matter.
It calculates a special hash which is unique for every file. The hash then gets checked for subtitle and other details in the database.
A beautiful web interface for services offered by OpenSubtitles API.
